speaker: ESCALUS
text: Every letter he hath writ hath disvouched

speaker: ESCALUS
text: other.

speaker: ANGELO
text: In most uneven and distracted manner. His

speaker: ANGELO
text: actions show much like to madness. Pray heaven his

speaker: ANGELO
text: wisdom be not tainted. And why meet him at the

speaker: ANGELO
text: gates and deliver our authorities there?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: I guess not.

speaker: ANGELO
text: And why should we proclaim it in an hour

speaker: ANGELO
text: before his entering, that if any crave redress of

speaker: ANGELO
text: injustice, they should exhibit their petitions in the

speaker: ANGELO
text: street?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: He shows his reason for that: to have a dispatch

speaker: ESCALUS
text: of complaints, and to deliver us from devices

speaker: ESCALUS
text: hereafter, which shall then have no power to stand

speaker: ESCALUS
text: against us.

speaker: ANGELO
text: Well, I beseech you let it be proclaimed.

speaker: ANGELO
text: Betimes i’ th’ morn, I’ll call you at your house. Give

speaker: ANGELO
text: notice to such men of sort and suit as are to meet

speaker: ANGELO
text: him.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: I shall, sir. Fare you well.

text:
